title: People Are Increasingly Worried AI Will Make Daily Life Worse
description: A Pew survey finds that a majority of Americans are more concerned than excited about the impact of artificial intelligence—adding weight to calls for more regulation.

title: The Inventor Behind a Rush of AI Copyright Suits Is Trying to Show His Bot Is Sentient
description: Stephen Thaler’s series of high-profile copyright cases has made headlines worldwide. He’s done it to demonstrate his AI is capable of independent thought.

title: She Sacrificed Her Youth to Get the Tech Bros to Grow Up
description: As a young industrial designer, Patricia Moore undertook a radical experiment in aging. Her discoveries reshaped the built world.
